guiTeacher.userInterfaces

Class ComponentContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • guiTeacher.userInterfaces.ComponentContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pane, Screen, ScrollablePane

    public abstract class ComponentContainer
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The quintessential container for Visible objects. There are two types of ComponentContainers, Screens that fill the whole window and Panes that have specified location width and height
    Author:
    bnockles
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
